className.description: Class names applied to the element or a function that returns them based on the component's state.

render.description: A function to customize rendering of the component.

renderBeforeHydration.description: If true, the indicator will include code to render itself before React hydrates. This will minimize the time the indicator is not visible after the SSR-generated content is downloaded.

cssVariablesDescriptions.--active-tab-bottom: Indicates the distance on the bottom side from the parent's container if the tab is active.
cssVariablesDescriptions.--active-tab-height: Indicates the width of the tab if it is active.
cssVariablesDescriptions.--active-tab-left: Indicates the distance on the left side from the parent's container if the tab is active.
cssVariablesDescriptions.--active-tab-right: Indicates the distance on the right side from the parent's container if the tab is active.
cssVariablesDescriptions.--active-tab-top: Indicates the distance on the top side from the parent's container if the tab is active.
cssVariablesDescriptions.--active-tab-width: Indicates the width of the tab if it is active.
